passive.name: RELENTLESS ASSAULT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) RELENTLESS ASSAULT
                                Attacks against champions and minions grant 5-19% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. (Max 5 stacks.)

q.name: (Q) LEAP STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) LEAP STRIKE
 7,5/7/6,5/6s   65 
                                
                                
                                Leaps to target unit, dealing 70 physical damage (70/125/180/235 + 100% bonus ) if it is an enemy. Can be cast to wards.

w.name: (W) EMPOWER
w.description:
(W) EMPOWER
 6/5/4/3s   30 
                                
                                
                                Empowers the next attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional 55 magic damage (55/100/145/190 + 60% ).Damage to monsters: 175%

e.name: (E) COUNTER STRIKE
e.description:
(E) COUNTER STRIKE
 12.5/11/9.5/8s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Enters a defensive stance that lasts up to 2 second(s), dodging all incoming attacks and abilities with on-hit effects and taking 25% reduced area damage from champions. After this duration, nearby enemies are stunned for 1 second(s) and take 35 magic damage (35/75/115/155 + 3% target’s max Health + 70% ). Each attack dodged increases this damage by 20% (up to 100%).Re-cast: Ends the defensive stance early to damage and stun nearby enemies immediately.
notes: duration, nearby enemies are stunned for 1 second(s) and take 35 magic damage (35/75/115/155 + 3% target’s max Health + 70% )

r.name: (R) GRANDMASTER'S MIGHT
r.description:
(R) GRANDMASTER'S MIGHT
 55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Deals an additional 60 magic damage (60/110/160 + 70% ) with every 3 consecutive basic attacks he launches within 3s.Active: Swings his stave, dealing 150 magic damage (150/250/350 + 100%  )  to nearby enemies. When hitting only one enemy champion, gains 30 Armor and Magic Resist (30/50/70+ 40% bonus ) equal to 60% of that Armor. If he hits more than one champion, he gains bonus 15 Armor and Magic Resist (15/20/25 + 10% bonus ) equals to 60% of that Armor for 8s per additional champion hit.During this time, his size increases by 10%, and he deals additional magic damage with every second attack.Damage to monsters: 110%.

core_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.

runes_detailed.name: Coup de Grace
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Coup de Grace
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
